Title: Fireball.DarkGDK
Description: The fireball dark gdk project is a project that aim to implement an object  oriented framework on top of DarkGDK the commercial game toolkit developed by thegamecreators.com the also aim to create some tools for easy game developement and integration with WCF and WF for flow controlled games
HomeWiki:
The fireball dark gdk project is a project that aim to implement an object oriented framework on top of DarkGDK the commercial game toolkit developed by thegamecreators.com the also aim to create some tools for easy game developement and integration with WCF and WF for flow controlled games


Fireball.DarkGDK
The objective of this project is to implement a complete object oriented framework for the DarkGDK Engine a commercial engine created by The Game Creators Ltd http://darkgdk.thegamecreators.com/?f=dgdk_net.
I am working on the Fireball.DarkGDK on my spare time and at the moment the project is on development, and no release are planned for now.
